original_text: Thou blind Pharisee, cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter, that the outside of them may be clean also.
korean_text: 눈 먼 바리새인이여 너는 먼저 안을 깨끗이 하라 그리하면 겉도 깨끗하리라

sentences.original_text: cleanse first that which is within the cup
sentences.korean_translation: 먼저 잔 속의 것을 깨끗이 하라

sentences.original_text: that the outside of them may be clean also.
